Body:
initial_data_inputs = [1, 2]
initial_expected_outputs = [2, 3]
create_pipeline_output_transformer = lambda : ResumablePipeline([(
    'output_transformer_1', MultiplyBy2OutputTransformer()), (
    'pickle_checkpoint', DefaultCheckpoint()), ('output_transformer_2',
    MultiplyBy2OutputTransformer())], cache_folder=tmpdir)
create_pipeline_output_transformer().fit_transform(data_inputs=
    initial_data_inputs, expected_outputs=initial_expected_outputs)
transformer = create_pipeline_output_transformer()
actual_data_container = transformer.handle_transform(DataContainer(
    data_inputs=initial_data_inputs, current_ids=[0, 1], expected_outputs=
    initial_expected_outputs), ExecutionContext(tmpdir))
assert np.array_equal(actual_data_container.data_inputs, [4, 8])
assert np.array_equal(actual_data_container.expected_outputs, [8, 12])
